attributes.title: I just can’t
attributes.review: Peppa pig said everything is going all right but I knew gorge was wrong I was in the car with bob marley but then drake came pooped on me but they in my room was lit and then when joe bidin came and said he going go to my bathroom but I said we are on top of the world but when Chris patt came to me in a glizzy suit and said if i catches him I can go New York but I don’t like Florida so we went the Boston heat vs Miami Celtics game and I asked Kobe if I can get a pair adidas so I went to my house in house in Ohio and Kanye west was there and it was carzy.

attributes.title: TRUMP IS CANCELED NOW AND FOR EVER
attributes.review: This app is really trash because for one you are trying to ban the most popular app in the USA.  So this app should not exist because who even made you president??? Because all you have did was when people were mostly dying from corona you gave China more supplies then you have in the USA when China started it.  Plus if your little friend lingling never ate a sag on bat we wouldn’t have this problem nor be in this situation.  So there for ALL apps including with the name donald orange lookin trump they ALL SHALL BE DELETED!!!

attributes.title: Trump app
attributes.review: This is the worst app ever everything is taking so long just to work it’s such a slow working app so instead of trying to ban TikTok from the U.S. that some of these kids worked really hard on and for some of these kids it’s their jobs this is how they get paid if you wanna be president again stop trying to run these people people out of business because you will start a riot in all 50 states and do you really think they would wanna vote for you.

attributes.title: this app gave me explosive diarrhea
attributes.review: I’ve currently been on the toilet for 5 days after downloading this app. I was ready to vote for trump this election but after downloading his app I began to feel queasy and haven’t gotten off the toilet since. I’ve now come to the conclusion that he somehow has brainwashed us into having severe diarrhea because a lot of my friends who downloaded the app are having the same problem! I will no longer be voting trump in November...and for the love of god...don’t download this app!

attributes.title: A Failed Mistake (Like Father Like App)
attributes.review: I tried downloading five times and it said If I don’t agree with stealing the country money.  I can’t join.  It also said family scandals is a requirement to join and tax fraud.  Then it said You have to be willing to lie and change your story many times.  It also said I would have to be okay with people I’d color being thugs and racist people as fine people.  Well they say things happen for reasons glad The download didn’t work entirely.

attributes.title: harry styles for president 2020
attributes.review: listen here, this app is ABSOLUTELY TERRIBLE✨✨🧚‍♀️✨🧚‍♀️🧚‍♀️✨it made my oven go all crazy and it ate my dog!!! 💜💜💜✨the app took over my phone and said that it is gonna find my address and kill my family💞💜💕✨💞💞🧚‍♀️🎀trump isn’t for the well being of the people✨✨✨💜💜💜💕💞✨✨ he’s a narcissist who is in love with himself👑💗✨🧚‍♀️💞💕but this app also said that it was gonna kill tyler the creator and machine gun kelly! ✨💜💕🤍 again this app is terrible and you should rate it a one star even though it’s worth zero stars. 💕✨💞🤍💜🧚‍♀️

attributes.title: Needs repair ASAP!
attributes.review: As a citizen of this great nation I am ashamed to only now, almost 4 years into the presidency, learn that I could have have Don’s orange glowing face on my phone 24/7.. I need to see our GREAT president at all times! Why doesn’t this app come automatically downloaded onto all iPhones??? I mean, the president sent us all unsolicited presidential texts, and his constant Tweets are UNMATCHED by any other world leader, this is definitely deep state tactics! The Apple cooperation should be punished for not 100% endorsing our Commander in Thief! 😡

attributes.title: Why so bad?
attributes.review: I was just minding my own business when I downloaded it to get more information and I HAD to put my phone number and personal information in?! I just wanted to learn more about you and you go and try to force your beliefs on me before I even check out your campaign?! I uninstalled it right away because then as I was walking home after getting it, I tripped over a poodle. It was a very curly poodle and you made me trip over it with your app curse! How dare!!!!

attributes.title: What to start with?🤔🙄
attributes.review: First and formost the app took an eternity to download and for a person trying to evaluate if different apps are good or not this really was bad And talking about bad the whole layout once you entered the app looked like someone just put some words next to the man trying to look caring which is definitely🙄debatable but that is just so tacky and unpleasant plus the loading screen looked like the teen titans which is offensive to thei show and how dare this app take that logo😡

attributes.title: Rip grandma 😔
attributes.review: After the app taking SEVERAL weeks to download, I went over to my grandmas house for her 87th birthday. All the family was there and were gathered around at her favorite classy restaurant. After she opened her gifts, I went over to my lovely Mammy May and asked to take a photo to always remember this moment. Upon opening my phone it opened up onto the app and once my grandma saw it and brought her into cardiac arrest and she died inside Denny’s. Needless to say I’m very displeased with this app.
